property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add Rhosgobel to the staging area. The opposing team searches the encounter deck for one different 0 cost enemy or 0 cost location per player and adds them to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Rhosgobel is explored, flip it over and add Rider of Mirkwood to the staging area. This stage cannot be defeated while Rhosgobel is in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card with cost 1 or less (cost 2 or less if there are two or more players), sets it aside, and shufles the encounter deck. Reveal the set aside card. Its 'when revealed' effects cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a location with cost 2 or less, adds it to the staging area, and places a resource on it. Shuffle the encounter deck. The location with a resource on it is immune to player card effects and the players cannot travel to it while this stage has any quest points remaining. This stage cannot be defeated while the location with a resource on it is in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card with cost 1 or less (cost 2 or less if there are two or more players), sets it aside, and shufles the encounter deck. Reveal the set aside card. Its 'when revealed' effects cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team chooses an ally controlled by each player and places them faceup under this stge as guarded objectives with blank text boxes. Players cannot play or put into play any ally that shares a title with an ally guarded by this stage. When this stage is defeated, return each guarded ally to its owner's hand.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card with cost 1 or less (cost 2 or less if there are two or more players), sets it aside, and shufles the encounter deck. Reveal the set aside card. Its 'when revealed' effects cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: This stage gets +5 quest points per player. Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, Rider of Mirkwood makes an immediate attack against the first player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card with cost 2 or less (3 or less if there are two or more players), sets it aside, and shuffles the encounter deck. Reveal the set aside card. Its 'when revealed' effects cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After the players have committed characters to the quest, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a treachery is discarded. Reveal that treachery. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card with cost 2 or less (3 or less if there are two or more players), sets it aside, and shuffles the encounter deck. Reveal the set aside card. Its 'when revealed' effects cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Each player discards from the top of the encounter deck until he discards an enemy, adds that enemy to the staging area, and attached a hero he controls to it as a guarded objective (discard all tokens from the chosen hero).If there is an unguarded hero in the staging area, return it to its owner's control, exhausted. This stage cannot be defeated while there is a guarded objective in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card with cost 2 or less (3 or less if there are two or more players), sets it aside, and shuffles the encounter deck. Reveal the set aside card. Its 'when revealed' effects cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: Rider of Mirkwood's engagement cost is considered to be 0. The number of damage tokens on Rider of Mirkwood cannot exceed the number of progress tokens on this stage.Players cannot defeat this stage while Rider of Mirkwood is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Traits
property.value: Forest. Village.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects.Response: After the players travel to Rhosgobel, add 1 resource to each hero's pool and each player draws 1 card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest

property.name: Traits
property.value: Nazgûl.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects.X is 1 more than the stage number of the main quest. Cannot leave the staging area unless the players are at stage 3B.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 15

property.name: Traits
property.value: Nazgûl.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have non-objective player card attachments or take non-combat damage. Forced: After Nazgûl of Dol Guldur attacks you, eithe return it to the staging area or raise your threat by 3.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 15

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dol Guldur.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player chooses a card in his hand. The opposing team looks at the first player's hand and chooses a different card to place faceup under Necromancer's Pass as a guarded objective. While Necromancer's Pass is guarding a card, copies of that card cannot be played. When Necromancer's Pass is explored, return the guarded card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 15

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The highest Û enemy in the staging area makes an immediate attack against the first player. If no attack is made this way, Pursued by Shadow gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If attacking enemy is unique, it makes an additional attack against you after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 16

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have non-objective player card attachments. Forced: After Bane of Amon Lanc attacks and destroys an ally, the defending player discards 1 card from his hand for each excess point of damage dealt by this attack.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 16

property.name: Text
property.value: While Oak-wood Grove is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on other locations in the staging area. Travel: Each player exhausts a character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 16

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team attached Smoking Blood to a Troll enemy. If they cannot, Smoking Blood gains surge.(Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per enemy. Forced: When attached enemy is dealt enough damage to destroy it, cancel the damage and discard Smoking Blood instead.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 17

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Insect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Forest Flies attacks, raise the defending player's threat by 1.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Raise your threat by 1 for each enemy engaged with you.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 17

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have attachments. Twilight Hall gets +1 $ for each character controlled by the first player. Forced: When Twilight Hall is explored, reveal 1 encounter card per player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 17

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player deals X damage to a character he controls, where X is more than the stage number of the main quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Attack (+2 Attack instead if the defending character has an attachment).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 18

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Goblin.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be optionally engaged. Forced: At the end of the combat phase, easy player deals 1 damage to a hero he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character does not count it's Defense.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 18

property.name: Traits
property.value: Mountain. Forest.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each Pine Slopes +2 $ until the end of the phase. Travel: Raise your threat by 1 for each Pine Slopes in the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 18

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to the main quest. (Counts as a condition attachment with the text: "Each player cannot play more than 1 card each phase.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 19

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Necromancer's Warg engages you, deal 1 damage to a character you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If you are engaged with an Orc enemy and a Warg enemy, discard a character you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 19

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Dol Guldur Beastmaster engages you, the opposing team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Necromancer's Warg and puts it into play engaged with you. Shuffle the enconter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 19

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Watched Path is explored, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is an enemy, add it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 19

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player deals 1 damage to a questing character he controls. Until the end of the phase, each damaged character gets -1 Ã’ and cannot be healed.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 20

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Spider of Dol Guldur attacks and destroys an ally, return it to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 20

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the beginning of the staging step, discard Patch of Midnight and reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 20

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team chooses a questing character controlled by each player. Ready each chosen character and remove them from the quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Attack. If this attack destroys a character, raise each player's threat by 1.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 21

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is a copy of Eastern Crows in the discard pile, Eastern Crows gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 21

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dol Guldur.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Sorcerer's Tower is in the staging area, each treachery gains Doomed 1. Forced: When the Sorcerer's Tower is explored, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a treachery is discarded. Resolve the 'when revealed' effects on that treachery.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 21

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team chooses any number of non-unique encounter cards in play. Discard the chosen cards and reveal an equal number of cards from the top of the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Either reveal an encounter card, or treat this attack as undefended.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 22

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have non-objective palyer card attachments.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 22

property.name: Traits
property.value: Forest. Cave.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the players travel to Troll Cave, each player draws 1 card. Travel: The opposing team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a Hill Troll and adds it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 22

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Û to the character with the most attachments without Befouled Equipment attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: At the end of the round, discard an attachment from attached character. Befouled Equipment cannot be discarded this way unless it is the only attachment on attached character.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 23

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Hunting Warg engages a player, it makes an immediate attack. If Hunting Warg is dealt a shadow card with no shadow effect for this attack, it gets +2 Û until the end of the phase.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 23

property.name: Traits
property.value: Mountain. Forest.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Hunter's Lookout is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: At the end of the round, raise each player's threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area."Travel: The highest Û enemy in the staging area makes an immediate attack against the first player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 23

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Return each engaged enemy to the staging area. If no enemies were returned this way, Restless Hunters gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Attack. If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 24

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player deals 1 damage to a character he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Defense for each damage on it.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 24

property.name: Traits
property.value: Forest. Road.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Shadow Road is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a player optionally engages an enemy, he deals 1 damage to a character he controls."Travel: Each player deals 1 damage to a character he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 24

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Attack (+2 Attack instead if the defending character is damaged).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 25

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Ravenous Spider attacks and destroys a character, the defending player exhausts a character he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 25

property.name: Text
property.value: Forest Gate gets +1 $ for each enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Attack for each enemy engaged with you.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 25

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to the first player's threat dial. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: Raise your threat by an additional point during the refresh phase.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 26

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Venomous Spider attacks and damages a character, that character cannot ready until the end of the round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 26

property.name: Text
property.value: While Pitch-dark Thicket is in the staging area, enemies in the staging area cannot take damage.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If attacking enemy was engaged this round, it cannot take damage until the end of the round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 26

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The opposing team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for one different 0 cost location per player (limit 2) and adds them to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, return the active location to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 27

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Dark Bats attacks and damages a character, reveal the top card of the encounter deck. Then, discard Dark Bats.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Attack. Deal it an additional shadow card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 27

property.name: Traits
property.value: Forest. River.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Forest Stream is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: At the end of the round, remove 2 progress from the main quest."Travel: Raise each player's threat by 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 27

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, each enemy and location in the staging area gets +2 $.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Each enemy engaged with you gets +1 Attack and +1 Defense until the end of the phase.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 28

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has the Warg trait, reveal it and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Attack (+2 Attack instead if it has the the Warg trait).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 28

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Warg's Glade is in the staging area, the first Warg enemy revealed each round gains surge. Forced: When The Warg's Glade is explored, the opposing team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a non-unique Warg enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Wizard's Quest 28

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Exhaust each character with an attachment. If no character is exhausted this way, Weighed Down gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard an attachment from the defending character.
